## Description {#details}

Class that provides utilities for VPBlockBases in <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vplan">VPlan</a>.

## Public Static Functions

### blocksOnly() {#a0360eea6cebcb1470f84b11f7ba51f16}

<MemberDefinition
  template={<>template &lt;typename BlockTy, typename T&gt;</>}
  prototype={<>static auto llvm::VPBlockUtils::blocksOnly (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> T &amp; Range)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Return an iterator range over <code>Range</code> which only includes <code><a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/hotcoldsplitting-cpp/#a0134180716271c522b7b0e1537ce7d9b">BlockTy</a></code> blocks.

The accesses are casted to <code><a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/ipo/hotcoldsplitting-cpp/#a0134180716271c522b7b0e1537ce7d9b">BlockTy</a></code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h/#l00183">183</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h">VPlanUtils.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### connectBlocks() {#a40bc7fec35d7093efcdbadf566d6b5ee}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void llvm::VPBlockUtils::connectBlocks (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42; From, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42; To, unsigned PredIdx=-1u, unsigned SuccIdx=-1u)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Connect VPBlockBases <code>From</code> and <code>To</code> bi-directionally.

If <code>PredIdx</code> is -1, append <code>From</code> to the predecessors of <code>To</code>, otherwise set <code>To&#39;s</code> predecessor at <code>PredIdx</code> to <code>From</code>. If <code>SuccIdx</code> is -1, append <code>To</code> to the successors of <code>From</code>, otherwise set <code>From&#39;s</code> successor at <code>SuccIdx</code> to <code>To</code>. Both VPBlockBases must have the same parent, which can be null. Both VPBlockBases can be already connected to other VPBlockBases.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h/#l00142">142</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h">VPlanUtils.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### disconnectBlocks() {#a61f1451694a3638db85170c7f55d5581}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void llvm::VPBlockUtils::disconnectBlocks (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42; From, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42; To)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Disconnect VPBlockBases <code>From</code> and <code>To</code> bi-directionally.

Remove <code>To</code> from the successors of <code>From</code> and <code>From</code> from the predecessors of <code>To</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h/#l00161">161</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h">VPlanUtils.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### insertBlockAfter() {#a1f625b90be26a131061ab1e43740cc81}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void llvm::VPBlockUtils::insertBlockAfter (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42; NewBlock, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42; BlockPtr)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Insert disconnected <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> <code>NewBlock</code> after <code>BlockPtr</code>.

Add <code>NewBlock</code> as successor of <code>BlockPtr</code> and <code>BlockPtr</code> as predecessor of <code>NewBlock</code>, and propagate <code>BlockPtr</code> parent to <code>NewBlock</code>. <code>BlockPtr&#39;s</code> successors are moved from <code>BlockPtr</code> to <code>NewBlock</code>. <code>NewBlock</code> must have neither successors nor predecessors.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h/#l00088">88</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h">VPlanUtils.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### insertBlockBefore() {#a69d51be488551c2983a022bb98494901}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void llvm::VPBlockUtils::insertBlockBefore (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42; NewBlock, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42; BlockPtr)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Insert disconnected block <code>NewBlock</code> before <code>Blockptr</code>.

First disconnects all predecessors of <code>BlockPtr</code> and connects them to <code>NewBlock</code>. Add <code>NewBlock</code> as predecessor of <code>BlockPtr</code> and <code>BlockPtr</code> as successor of <code>NewBlock</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h/#l00105">105</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h">VPlanUtils.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### insertOnEdge() {#a2057d0749eedf6749f9e1cc6694eb1fd}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void llvm::VPBlockUtils::insertOnEdge (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42; From, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42; To, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42; BlockPtr)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Inserts <code>BlockPtr</code> on the edge between <code>From</code> and <code>To</code>.

That is, update <code>From&#39;s</code> successor to <code>To</code> to point to <code>BlockPtr</code> and <code>To&#39;s</code> predecessor from <code>From</code> to <code>BlockPtr</code>. <code>From</code> and <code>To</code> are added to <code>BlockPtr&#39;s</code> predecessors and successors respectively. There must be a single edge between <code>From</code> and <code>To</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h/#l00204">204</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h">VPlanUtils.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### insertTwoBlocksAfter() {#a3a43b6445802190031bda62347e97453}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void llvm::VPBlockUtils::insertTwoBlocksAfter (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42; IfTrue, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42; IfFalse, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42; BlockPtr)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Insert disconnected VPBlockBases <code>IfTrue</code> and <code>IfFalse</code> after <code>BlockPtr</code>.

Add <code>IfTrue</code> and <code>IfFalse</code> as succesors of <code>BlockPtr</code> and <code>BlockPtr</code> as predecessor of <code>IfTrue</code> and <code>IfFalse</code>. Propagate <code>BlockPtr</code> parent to <code>IfTrue</code> and <code>IfFalse</code>. <code>BlockPtr</code> must have no successors and <code>IfTrue</code> and <code>IfFalse</code> must have neither successors nor predecessors.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h/#l00123">123</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h">VPlanUtils.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### reassociateBlocks() {#a63345282cd67ea46202fb33523be1408}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void llvm::VPBlockUtils::reassociateBlocks (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42; Old, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/vpblockbase">VPBlockBase</a> &#42; New)</>}
  labels = {["inline", "static"]}>
Reassociate all the blocks connected to <code>Old</code> so that they now point to <code>New</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h/#l00169">169</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/vplanutils-h">VPlanUtils.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
